name: Snail Mail (itch) (TheFuzzySheep)
description:
Help Beau the snail deliver mail!

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Move

E - Pick Up / Throw

R - Restart Level

A very crude prototype for my game! It's very buggy and was made quickly, so if you have any ideas or bug solutions, please let me know!

Made by TheFuzzySheep (programming, art, and game design) and Just_Qwert (level design and moral support)
